entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
